results.title: Genetic diagnosis and clinical analysis of 17alpha-hydroxylase/17, 20-lyase deficiency combined with type 2 diabetes mellitus: A case report
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ received @CHEMICAL_Dexamethasone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003907 @@@dexamethasone@@@, @CHEMICAL_Estradiol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004958 @@@estradiol valerate@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine besylate@@@ and D3 calcium carbonate tablets.

citations.NLM: Zhang Y, Yuan Y. Genetic diagnosis and clinical analysis of 17alpha-hydroxylase/17, 20-lyase deficiency combined with type 2 diabetes mellitus: A case report Medicine (Baltimore). 2023 Dec 29;102(52):e36727. PMID: 38206738
citations.BibTeX: @article{38206738, title={Genetic diagnosis and clinical analysis of 17alpha-hydroxylase/17, 20-lyase deficiency combined with type 2 diabetes mellitus: A case report}, author={Zhang Y and Yuan Y}, journal={Medicine (Baltimore)}, volume={102}, number={52}, pages={e36727}}

results.title: Metformin Attenuates Abeta Pathology Mediated Through Levamisole Sensitive Nicotinic Acetylcholine Receptors in a C. elegans Model of Alzheimer's Disease.
results.text_hl: We found that @GENE_APP @GENE_351 @@@Abeta@@@ expressed in muscle inhibited @CHEMICAL_Levamisole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007978 @@@levamisole@@@ sensitive nicotinic acetylcholine receptors and that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ delayed @GENE_APP @GENE_351 @@@Abeta@@@-linked @<m>DISEASE_Paralysis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010243 @@@paralysis@@@ and improved @CHEMICAL_Acetylcholine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000109 @@@acetylcholine@@@ neurotransmission in these animals.

citations.NLM: Ahmad W, Ebert PR. Metformin Attenuates Abeta Pathology Mediated Through Levamisole Sensitive Nicotinic Acetylcholine Receptors in a C. elegans Model of Alzheimer's Disease. Mol Neurobiol. 2017 Sep;54(7):5427-5439. PMID: 27596506
